edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.clientCommandProcessor

Class ClientRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp.clientCommandProcessor.ClientRequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientRequestHandlerInterface

    public class ClientRequestHandler
extends Object
implements ClientRequestHandlerInterface
    Implements basic functionality needed by servers to handle client type requests. Abstracts out the storing of request info, caching and communication needs of a node.
    Author:
    Westy
